synonyms: daśamete—in the Tenth Chapter; mūla-skandhera—of the main trunk; śākhā-ādi—of the branches, etc.; gaṇana—enumeration; sarva-śākhā-gaṇera—of all branches; yaiche—in what way; phala-vitaraṇa—distribution of the fruits.
translation: The Tenth Chapter describes the branches and subbranches of the main trunk, and the distribution of their fruits.
